        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

import pandas_profiling as pp
from pandas_profiling import ProfileReport
profile = ProfileReport(df1,title="Pandas Profiling Report 2015", explorative=True)
profile.to_notebook_iframe()
source.e4f82342:
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
plt.plot(df1['Happiness Score'],df1['Economy (GDP per Capita)'])
plt.title('Happiness Score vs Economy(GDP per Capita)')
plt.xlabel('Happiness Score')
plt.ylabel('Economy(GDP per Capita)')
plt.show()
source.68af9897:
plt.plot(df1['Happiness Score'],df1['Family'])
plt.title('Happiness Score vs Family')
plt.xlabel('Happiness Score')
plt.ylabel('Family')
plt.show()
source.04c90038:
top5_2015=df1[['Country','Happiness Rank', 'Happiness Score']].head()
plt.bar(top5_2015['Country'],top5_2015['Happiness Score'])
for index, value in enumerate(top5_2015['Happiness Score']):
    plt.text(index-0.25,value, str(value))

source.37a39322: Dataset for each year  has varying number and type of columns.
source.a6532438: Togo being the least happy country, we can see for all the parameters like Economy(GDP per Capita), Family, Health(Life Expectancy), Freedom, Trust(Government Corruption), Generosity, Dystomia Residual, the score is lesser than the average.
source.1da85c55:
According to Pandas Profiling Report

Mean of **Economy(per GDP)** score is 0.8461372151898735.
Mean of **Family** score is 0.9910459493670887
Mean of **Health(Life Expectancy)** score is 0.6302593670886076
Mean of **Freedom** score is 0.42861493670886075
Mean of **Trust(Government Corruption)** score is 0.14342183544303796
Mean of **Generosity** score is 0.2372955063291139
Mean of **Dystopia Residual** score is 2.098976772151899
source.e955aa6c: Switzerland being the happiest country, we can see for all the parameters like Economy(GDP per Capita), Family, Health(Life Expectancy), Freedom, Trust(Government Corruption), Generosity, Dystomia Residual, the score is greater than the average.
